works.description: At the Salone del Mobile in Milan this year, French designer Matali Crasset presented a futuristic convertible sofa called “Dyanamic Life” for Campeggi. One of the most high-tech sofas we have ever seen, the Dynamic Life has a built-in touch pad, which you can use to configure the shape-shifting couch in a number of ways. At the touch of a button, the amazing furniture unit unfurls to offer a seating/relaxing configuration to your liking. You can create a bed, a chaise longue, a two-seater couch and more.
